name: DynamicStorage
short_description:
This project aims to create a C library for handling data structures.
There are two main goals I'd like to reach:
1) provide library users with a set of data structures such as lists (singly linked, doubly linked, circularly linked), stacks, queues, trees, Btrees, quadtrees, octrees, ... capable of containing any kind of data;
2) provide functions and data types useful to design new data structures.
summary: C library to handle dynamic data structures.
